name: pttrn!
description:
Tap-tap madness with beautiful patterns!

Your goal is to pass as many walls as you can.

Change 3 forms in circle to find the right one fits the next wall.
Become a master and make great combos: collect diamond, lives and power-ups. While loosing watch incredibly crushing walls!

FEATURES:

Fantastic "one-touch" gameplay
Unique packs of characters to unlock
Endless gameplay & increasing speed
Crazy two-finger split and change hardmode for maniacs!
